item.title: 乌干达是最新一个将黄金作为货币盾牌的非洲国家
item.description: 乌干达计划在国内购买黄金以建立外汇储备并限制储备投资的风险，成为最新一个转向贵金属以支持其货币的非洲国家。【原文：Uganda plans domestic gold purchases to build foreign exchange reserves and limit risks on reserve investments, becoming the latest African nation to turn to the precious metal to back up its currency.】

item.title: 全球降息预期升温 新兴市场股市创两年新高
item.description: 由于核心经济体和发展中经济体对货币宽松政策的押注增强，风险偏好保持强劲，新兴市场股市再创两年新高，货币也有所上涨。【原文：Emerging-market stocks hit another two-year high and currencies gained as risk appetite stayed strong thanks to stronger bets on monetary easing across core and developing economies.】

item.title: 对国债的巨大赌注需要有利的通胀数据来维持
item.description: 一直期待国债市场反弹的债券投资者现在希望周四的美国通胀数据能为他们背书。【原文：Bond investors who’ve been positioning for a rally in the Treasury market are now looking for an endorsement from Thursday’s US inflation data.】

item.title: 越来越多的环境、社会和治理债务发行人将面临债券处罚
item.description: 现在，越来越多与环境、社会和公司治理挂钩的债券背后的公司可能会面临经济处罚，一旦触发处罚，投资者的回报就会增加。【原文：A growing number of firms behind ESG-linked bonds may now be facing financial penalties that would drive up investor returns once triggered.】

item.title: 高盛策略师称大科技公司的人工智能支出令投资者担忧
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Investors are growing increasingly concerned that US technology megacaps are spending too much on artificial intelligence, according Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: BE 研究显示，德国工业遭受了永久性打击
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的研究表明，德国工业将无法完全摆脱过去几年低迷的影响。【原文：Germany’s industry won’t be able to fully shake off the impact from its downturn of the past years, according to research by Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 尽管价格上涨，欧洲可可仍大幅跳水，令人惊讶
item.description: 就在巧克力制造商面临可可豆价格上涨的压力之际，欧洲的可可加工量在第二季度意外增长。【原文：Cocoa processing in Europe unexpectedly rose in the second quarter, just as chocolate makers face pressure from higher bean prices.】

item.title: 约瑟夫-斯蒂格利茨谈如何建立防震供应链
item.description:
鼓励公司进行更长远的思考。【原文：

Encouraging companies to think more long-term.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油出口收入降至 4 个月新低，流量减少
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，由于石油出口量略有下降，俄罗斯的石油出口收入降至 2 月份以来的最低点。【原文：Russia’s revenues from oil exports fell to the lowest since February amid slightly lower shipment volumes, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 核心通胀顽固，秘鲁央行将维持利率不变
item.description: 周四，秘鲁可能将连续第二个月保持基准利率稳定，因为央行青睐的通胀指标仍居高不下。【原文：Peru will likely hold its benchmark interest rate steady for a second straight month on Thursday as a measure of inflation that’s favored by the central bank remains high.】

item.title: 信实工业集团计划提供超过 5 亿美元的海外贷款
item.description: 印度最大的企业信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）旗下的一个部门正计划借入至少 5 亿美元用于债务再融资，这可能是该企业集团今年的第一笔海外贷款。【原文：A unit of India’s largest company Reliance Industries Ltd. is planning to borrow at least $500 million to refinance debt, in what could be the conglomerate’s first offshore loan this year.】

item.title: 新加坡企业希望马来西亚特区减少繁文缛节
item.description: 据新加坡最高商会的一项民意调查显示，新加坡企业希望与马来西亚建立一个联合经济特区，以减少繁文缛节，帮助解决劳动力和互联互通问题。【原文：Singapore businesses want a planned joint special economic zone with Malaysia to slash red tape and help with labor and connectivity issues, according to a poll by the city’s top chamber of commerce.】

item.title: 日本 40 年期政府债券收益率首次突破 3
item.description: 日本 40 年期国债收益率自 2007 年首次发行以来首次触及 3%。【原文：Japan’s 40-year government bond yield touched 3% for first time since this maturity was first issued in 2007.】

item.title: 西班牙政府提议埃斯克里瓦担任中央银行行长：西班牙国家报
item.description: 西班牙国家报》援引不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道称，西班牙政府已提议由数字转型大臣何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）担任央行行长。【原文：Spain’s government has proposed Digital Transformation Minister Jose Luis Escriva as central bank governor, El País reported, citing unidentified people close to the matter.】

item.title: Pick n Pay 在零售商改革中提出 2.21 亿美元的报价条款
item.description: Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. 制定了 40 亿兰特（2.21 亿美元）的供股条款，作为南非第三大杂货商（按收入计算）改革的一部分。【原文：Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. set out the terms of a 4 billion-rand ($221 million) rights offer that forms part of a revamp of South Africa’s third-biggest grocer by revenue.】

item.title: 热浪刺激需求，意大利天然气溢价扩大
item.description: 意大利的天然气溢价走高，表明随着热浪席卷南欧，该国对天然气燃料的需求更加强劲。【原文：Italy’s premium for natural gas edged higher, signaling stronger demand for the fuel in the country as a heat wave takes hold of southern Europe.】

item.title: 美国重要通胀数据公布前欧洲股市走高
item.description: 欧洲股市继周三强劲上涨后继续走高，投资者期待着今天晚些时候公布的美国关键通胀数据。【原文：European stocks edged higher following strong gains on Wednesday, with investors looking ahead to a key US inflation reading later today.】

item.title: 交易商等待北京政策信号，铁矿石震荡走高
item.description: 本周铁矿石交易继续震荡，在下周北京大型政治会议召开之前，市场信号好坏参半，铁矿石价格难以找到方向。【原文：Iron ore continued a volatile week of trading, with prices struggling to find direction amid mixed market signals ahead of next week’s big political gathering in Beijing.】

item.title: 防务初创企业赫尔辛公司估值 50 亿欧元，欲向北约东翼扩张
item.description: Helsing 是一家为国防开发人工智能软件的初创公司，该公司已筹集到 4.5 亿欧元（约合 4.87 亿美元）的风险投资资金，计划用于扩大其在与俄罗斯接壤的欧洲国家的业务。【原文：Helsing, a startup developing artificial intelligence software for defense, has raised €450 million ($487 million) in venture capital funding that it plans to use to expand its presence in European nations bordering Russia.】

item.title: 四川生物制药申请 5 亿美元香港 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，四川生物制药股份有限公司已申请在香港上市，可能筹集约 5 亿美元资金，成为香港正在进行的规模较大的交易之一。【原文：Sichuan Biokin Pharmaceutical Co. filed for a Hong Kong listing that could raise about $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter, making it one of the larger deals in the city’s pipeline.】

item.title: 阿联酋法院以恐怖主义罪名判处 50 多人有罪
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国判定 50 多人犯有恐怖主义罪，指控他们与穆斯林兄弟会（在这个海湾国家被认定为恐怖组织）一起活动和工作。【原文：The United Arab Emirates convicted more than 50 people on terrorism charges, accusing them of operating and working with the Muslim Brotherhood, designated a terrorist organization in the Gulf country.】

item.title: 腾讯投资后，泰国顶级音乐公司寻求上市
item.description: 继最近获得中国腾讯控股有限公司的股权投资后，GMM Music Pcl 计划最早于今年进行首次公开募股。【原文：GMM Music Pcl is planning an initial public offering as early as this year, following a recent equity investment from China’s Tencent Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 法国央行行长警告不要扩大国家赤字
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（François Villeroy de Galhau）在各政党争相组建法国下届政府之际警告说，法国不能再继续增加赤字，也不能再让企业承担更多的税收和成本。【原文：France cannot afford to keep increasing its deficit or burden its companies with more taxes and costs, Bank of France Governor François Villeroy de Galhau warned as political parties jostle to form the country’s next government.】

item.title: 瑞典长期通胀预期在调查中走高
item.description: Prospera 最新调查显示，由于央行开始降低借贷成本，瑞典长期通胀率预期略高于瑞典央行 2% 的目标。【原文：Expectations for Sweden’s long-term inflation rate rose slightly above the Riksbank’s 2% target as the central bank has started taking borrowing costs lower, the latest Prospera survey showed.】

item.title: 津巴布韦必须结束 "美元控制 "才能重获经济主权
item.description: 新闻秘书尼克-曼格瓦纳（Nick Mangwana）说，津巴布韦必须采取必要措施，结束对美元的依赖，增加本国货币的使用。【原文：Zimbabwe must take the necessary steps to end its reliance on the dollar and increase the use of its own currency, Information Secretary Nick Mangwana said.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司接受英国监管机构的特别监督
item.description: 根据监管机构 Ofwat 周四制定的计划，英国最大的自来水和污水处理公司将被纳入特别措施体系，该公司可能被解散或在证券交易所上市。【原文：The UK’s biggest water and sewage company will be put into a special measures regime that could see the company broken up or listed on the stock exchange, under plans set out by the regulator Ofwat on Thursday.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀降至 2021 年低点，为降息提供了空间
item.description: 罗马尼亚通胀率放缓至 2021 年以来的最低点，这为罗马尼亚央行在三年来首次降息后继续推行货币宽松政策提供了空间。【原文：Romanian inflation slowed to the lowest pace since 2021, boosting scope for the central bank to press ahead with monetary easing after the first cut to interest rates in three years.】

item.title: 英国 5 月经济增长 0.4%，比预期快一倍
item.description: 5 月份，英国经济复苏势头强劲，为工党新政府急于重振国家增长前景的努力提前注入了活力。【原文：The UK’s economic recovery gathered momentum in May, an early boost to the new Labour government as it rushes to revive the country’s growth prospects.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国经济增速是预期的两倍
item.description: 通勤者经过伦敦金融城平方英里金融区的伦敦大火纪念碑。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Commuters pass The Monument to the great fire of London, in the square mile financial district of the City of London. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 瑞典 Intrum 公司与债券持有人达成重组协议
item.description: 瑞典收债公司 Intrum AB 已与大多数债券持有人达成协议，以解决其 54 亿欧元（58 亿美元）的债务问题，包括迫使信贷投资者亏损和推迟票据到期日。【原文：Swedish debt collector Intrum AB has reached an agreement with a majority of its bondholders to address its €5.4 billion ($5.8 billion) debt pile, including a forced loss on credit investors and pushing out the notes’ maturities.】
